summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of March 1, 2015, to March 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments.
locations: St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account balances for the Butterfly Trust as of March 31, 2015.
The beginning balance was $320,816.73, with an ending balance of $83,598.63.
A significant outgoing money transfer of $237,270.00 to Standard Chartered Bank, New York, is noted.
Interest earned during the period was $51.90.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
